transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello we are calling from Chittoor are you here company.
Executive: Yes sir yes sir good morning.
Customer: Sir buyer lead seller lead buyer lead one second sir aapko kya problem ho rahi hai?
Customer: buyer seller buyer only buyer aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on
